Project layout¶

Python code¶

C code¶

Kernel¶

Kernels are short pieces of C code which are compiled via OpenCL and run on a GPU.

Library¶

Library contains simple C functions that Kernels may include and use. The code in library is compiled via pystats setup.py and made available to the kernels.
